thread.title: Watch Ramsay quarterback Baniko Harley announce OVC football commitment
thread.title_full: Watch Ramsay quarterback Baniko Harley announce OVC football commitment

author: Gary Estwick | gestwick@al.com
title: Watch Ramsay quarterback Baniko Harley announce OVC football commitment
text: Ohio Valley Conference football is about to rise up - thanks to Ramsay quarterback Baniko Harley. The state champion playmaker has made a decision about his college football future, and he collaborated with AL.com to announce his plans.Check out the video above to discover Harley's fall football address.
